context.name: Chiappa Rhino Nebula 120DS .357 Long Barrel Revolver
context.excerpt: The Chiappa Rhino 120DS Long Barrel Revolver is a favourite in the revolver community for good reason and has now been made available in a striking Nebula finish.
context.content:
The Chiappa Rhino 120DS .357 Long Barrel Revolver is a favourite in the revolver community for good reason and has now been made available in a striking Nebula finish.

The revolver features a mixed-colour PVD (Physical Vapor Deposition) finish that provides more resistance to corrosion and blemishes. Chiappa’s new finish covers all outer metal surfaces. Chiappa has also included a blue laminate grip that pairs perfectly with the purple and blue tones of the new “Nebula” finish.

 

Chiappa Rhino Nebula 120DS .357 Long Barrel Revolver Features:

12” 1:12” twist barrel
Black anodised Aluminium barrel sleeve
PVD Nebula finish
Adjustable Fibre-Optic sights
.357 mag (can fire loose rounds, or with full moon clips, or from an L-frame speed loader)
Blue laminate grip
Weight 1155g
